data.comment: The match is underway at City Ground.
The first half has been concluded at City Ground.
In the minute 46, Stephen Martin has blown to start the second-half.
An attacking Rotherham player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Daniel Barlaser nets and Rotherham now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 54, Jamie Lindsay (Rotherham) has received a first yellow card.
The away team replace Jamie Lindsay with Shaun MacDonald.
Lyle Taylor is replacing Luke Freeman for the home team.
In the minute 69, Matthew Olosunde is on a sub for Mikel Miller for Rotherham.
Nottingham make their second substitution with Harry Arter replacing Jack Colback.
Rotherham make their third substitution with Kieran Sadlier replacing Billy Jones.
In the minute 79, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Sammy Ameobi.
Wes Harding is booked for the away team.
